title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 2X GTA$ and RP on Hasta La Vista
content:
Hasta La Vista is a furious race for survival between bikers pedaling frantically toward the finish line and relentless truckers trying to mow them down. No matter who comes out on top, all payouts are Doubled on this returning mode through April 16.

Get started by heading over to Legion Square and joining the Featured Series.
